titleStmt.title: A true account from on board the good ship Cæsar, in her voyage to the East Indies· Captain - Wright commander.
titleStmt.author: Walford, William, fl. 1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by H. Hills, Jun. and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
